attributes.action: Change the Rules on Golf During Lock Down. Covid Times
attributes.additional_details:
This needs to be changed NOW
Golf is a great way of exercise and a outside sport, very rare are all golfers on the same fareway. This helps with mental Health issue. Golfers can social distance because they are on a golf course outside. 
Fishing is allowed and Golf is not please explain why.
attributes.background:
Golf is a great way of exercise and a outside sport, very rare are all golfers on the same fareway. This helps with mental Health issue. Golfers can social distance because they are on a golf course outside.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
